# function: predefined_role_id

Returns the ID of a predefined role.

## Example Usage

```terraform
locals {
  # owner role id of organization org-123
  owner_role_id = provider::openai::predefined_role_id("owner", "org-123")

  # reader role id of organization org-123
  reader_role_id = provider::openai::predefined_role_id("reader", "org-123")
}
```

## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
predefined_role_id(role string, organization_id string) string
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `role` (String) The role of the predefined role. `owner` or `reader`.
1. `organization_id` (String) The ID of the organization.
